text.div:
OMH to FHIR Specimen Source ValueSet

The specimen analyzed. The current value set is taken from the SNOMED CT Body substance sample (specimen) hierarchy. The local (UI) display term is the Snomed preferred term without the word 'specimen'. More values will be added as needed.

Copyright Statement: Open mHealth copyright 2015, a project of the Tides Center. All Rights Reserved. This specification includes content from SNOMED Clinical Terms速 (SNOMED CT速) which is copyright of the International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO) (trading as SNOMED International). Implementers of these specifications must have the appropriate SNOMED CT Affiliate license - for more information contact http://www.snomed.org/snomed-ct/get-snomed-ct or info@snomed.org

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    258479004interstitial fluid
    122554006capillary blood
    119361006plasma
    119364003serum
    122594008tears
    258580003whole blood
